name: RaShawn Renée
what_you_do: RaShawn-Renée leads speaking, teaching, and signing engagements to help individuals gain understanding of their Real Truth and Power and discover the possibility to them once they make the Self-Honoring Choice to live a Wholly-Fulfilling-Life.
who_you_serve: Individuals that are chosen by their Employer, University, Community or Organization to learn the profound knowledge of their Real Truth and how to live with Power.
offering: Tools, understanding, language, and next steps so that each participant can walk away having benefited from the engagement and next steps to live the life they truly desire.
social_proof: RaShawn-Renée had a full-circle moment and moments of gratitude for another recognition of the guidance from her Inner-Knowing of a seemingly chance encounter at a Revelation Conference more than a decade ago.
signature_programs: 44 Hours & 21 Minutes; A Woman's Truth & Power
audience_type: individuals, employees, students, community leaders, organizers
business_focus: Providing speaking, teaching, and signing engagements to help individuals gain understanding of their Real Truth and Power and discover the possibility to them once they make the Self-Honoring Choice to live a Wholly-Fulfilling-Life.
